price: Nagsabi sila: “Bagkus naghatid kami sa iyo ng [pagdurusang] sila dati kaugnay rito ay nagtataltalan.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
